summary.span: Represents a collection of objects for a .

span.span: Represents a collection of objects for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 定義結構描述的，並判斷何種資料每個可以包含。The defines the schema of a , and determines what kind of data each can contain. 您可以存取透過屬性物件。You can access the through the property of the object. 使用和方法來插入及刪除物件。The uses the and methods to insert and delete objects. 使用屬性來判斷多少物件位於集合中。Use the property to determine how many objects are in the collection. 使用方法以驗證指定的索引或資料行名稱是否存在集合中。Use the method to verify whether a specified index or column name exists in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例逐一查看集合的物件，並列印每個資料行集合中的各種屬性。The following example iterates through a collection of objects and prints various properties of each column in the collection. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會執行幾項檢查後再傳回`true`或`false`結果。The method performs several checks before returning a `true` or `false` result. 這包括下列： 資料行是否存在、 所屬的資料表，或條件約束或關聯性的。This includes the following: whether the column exists, belongs to the table, or is involved in a constraint or relation. 使用方法，再嘗試從集合中移除任何資料行。Use the method before you try to remove any column from a collection. 您也可以使用方法，以判斷您嘗試將它移除之前，是否存在特定的資料行。You can also use the method to determine whether a particular column exists before you try to remove it. ## Examples 下列範例會先使用方法，以判斷是否在集合中找到特定的資料行。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找不到，方法會測試是否可以移除資料行。If found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 因此，資料行都會移除，如果方法。If so, the column is removed with the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以執行資料行上的其他作業之前，確認資料行是否存在。Use the method to confirm the existence of a column before you perform additional operations on the column. 方法會傳回`false`時兩個或多個資料行具有相同名稱但不同的命名空間。The method returns `false` when two or more columns have the same name but different namespaces. 如果沒有任何模稜兩可比對一個資料行的資料行名稱時，呼叫就會失敗。The call does not succeed if there is any ambiguity when matching a column name to exactly one column. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法和方法，以判斷是否可以移除資料行。The following example uses the method and the method to determine whether the column can be removed. 如果是的話，會移除資料行。If so, the column is removed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜尋資料行名稱時，就是有條件地區分大小寫。 is conditionally case-sensitive when it searches for column names. 例如，如果一個名為"mydatacolumn"和另一個名為"Mydatacolumn 」，用來搜尋的其中一個資料行的字串視為為區分大小寫。For example, if one is named "mydatacolumn" and another is named "Mydatacolumn", a string used to search for one of the columns is regarded as case-sensitive. 不過，如果"mydatacolumn 」 存在，"Mydatacolumn"並不會搜尋字串會視為區分大小寫。However, if "mydatacolumn" exists and "Mydatacolumn" does not, the search string is regarded as case-insensitive. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性列印值索引所指定的物件。The following example uses the property to print the value of a object specified by index. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.this1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Removes the column at the specified index from the collection.

span.span: Removes the column at the specified index from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果集合已成功變更藉由新增或移除資料行、就會發生事件。If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing columns, the event occurs. ## Examples 下列範例會先使用方法，以判斷是否在集合中找到特定的資料行。The following example first uses the method to determine whether a particular column is found in the collection. 如果找到，方法會測試是否可以移除資料行。If it is found, the method tests whether the column can be removed. 因此，資料行都會移除，如果方法。If so, the column is removed with the method. [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnCollection.RemoveAt Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: The collection does not have a column at the specified index.

span.span: The collection does not have a column at the specified index.
